thread.title_full: Facebook signals deeper push into e-commerce with Pages redesign - ComputerWorld - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: ComputerWorld
title: Facebook signals deeper push into e-commerce with Pages redesign - ComputerWorld
text:
Facebook is making changes to its Pages service to attract more businesses, in part by giving them a new way to showcase their products. The company has revamped the way Pages appear on mobile devices, giving businesses more ways to interact with customers using smartphones and tablets.
Start the conversation, or Read more at ComputerWorld.
